mapper.insert: insert into t_sms_record (id, template_type, send_port, mobile, sms_type, msg, result, sid, fee, create_time, creator_role, creator_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{templateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sendPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smsType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
